ai-ya2.3.3:1.1_0: He who shall completely understand the mass of form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ya2.3.3:2.1_0: If anyone who is aware of feelings will completely understand the mass of form,
ai-ya2.3.3:3.1_0: anyone who doesn’t completely understand the mass of form.
ai-ya2.3.3:4.1_0: If anyone who doesn’t completely understand feelings, their entire mass of form will not completely understand.
